Alert: Cannot be surprised/Unseen foes gain no Adv on attacks on self
Beguiling Twist: R120' Use Reaction to redirect saved charm or fright effect to different target for 1 min (DC 17 Wis ends)
Dreadful Strikes: Weapon hit does +1d6 HP psychic 1/rd
Favored Foe: Hit on marked foe inflicts +1d8 HP weapon damage for conc or 1 min 6/long rest
Feral Senses: Suffers no Disadv vs. invisible foe
Fighting Style (Blind Fighting): R10' Detect invisible creatures
Fighting Style (Thrown Weapon Fighting): Draw thrown weapon as part of Attack action, +2 HP weapon damage with thrown weapon
Foe Slayer: May gain choice of +3 attack or damage vs. favored enemy 1/rd
Gathered Swarm: After a hit, companion swarm moves self 5', moves foe 15' (DC 17 Str neg), or inflicts 1d8 HP piercing
Savage Attacker: May take the best of two melee damage rolls 1/rd
Swarming Dispersal: When hit, use Reaction to gain resistance and teleport 30' 6/long rest
Tireless: Self gains 1d8+3 temporary HP 6/long rest, short rest reduces exhaustion by 1

Spells:
Arcane Eye (R4 [Swarmkeeper] Divi): R30' Self sees w/darkvision through a remote invisible eye that moves 30'/rd for conc up to 1 hr
Beast Sense (R2 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Self may perceive through touched willing beast's senses for conc up to 1 hr [R]
Charm Person (R1 [Fey Wanderer] Ench): R30' Target regards you as a friend (Wisdom neg) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Commune With Nature (R5 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Self gains 3 facts about nature w/in 3 miles (300' underground) [R]
Conjure Woodland Beings (R4 Conj): R60' Summons 1/2/4/8 obedient CR 2/1/half/quarter fey creatures for conc, 1 hr, or until slain [+Level doubles/triples creature count at level 6/8]
Cordon Of Arrows (R2 Tran): R5' Four pieces of ammo attack non-designated creatures w/in 30', inflicting 1d6 HP piercing each (Dexterity neg), for 8 hr [+Level affects +2 pieces]
Dimension Door (R4 [Fey Wanderer] Conj): Self teleports up to 500'; may bring along 1 willing creature
Dispel Magic (R3 [Fey Wanderer] Abju): R120' Ends the effects of a spell up to level 3; successful DC 10 + spell level ends a higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Dominate Beast (R4 Ench): R60' Target obeys self telepathic commands (Wisdom neg; damage yields another save) for conc up to 1 min [+Level extends duration to 10 min/1 hr/8 hr at level 5/6/7]
Ensnaring Strike (R1 Conj): Self next successful attack restrains foe and inflicts 1d6 HP/rd piercing (Strength ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Entangle (R1 Conj): R90' 20' sq ensnares creatures (Strength neg) for conc up to 1 min
Faerie Fire (R1 [Swarmkeeper] Evoc): R60' Objects in a 20' cube glow, giving foes Adv on attacks (Dexterity neg) for conc up to 1 min
Fog Cloud (R1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for conc up to 1 hr [+Level increases radius by 20']
Gaseous Form (R3 [Swarmkeeper] Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous for conc up to 1 hr
Greater Restoration (R5 Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, or cursed or regains ability or HP maximum

Locate Creature (R4 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Self learns location of specified creature or species w/in 1000' for conc up to 1 hr
Longstrider (R1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Mage Armor (W1 Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr (target donning armor ends)
Mage Hand (R0 [Swarmkeeper] Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Meld Into Stone (R3 Tran): Self may step into rock for 8 hr [R]

Misty Step (R2 [Misty Wanderer] Conj): Teleports self 30'

Revivify (R3 Necr): Restores life and 1 HP to a touched 1-minute-old corpse

Tree Stride (R5 Conj): Self may teleport 500' between like trees 1/rd for conc up to 1 min

Magic Notes:
Fighting Style (Druidic Warrior): Know 2 D0 cantrips, replace 1 each level
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 W0 spells/May cast chosen W1 spell 1/long rest
Fey Reinforcements: Cast Summon Fey 1/long rest, optionally for 1 min instead of conc, 1/long rest
Misty Wanderer: Cast R5' Misty Step targeting self and 1 other 3/long rest
Nature's Veil: Self becomes invisible for 1 rd 6/long rest
Primal Awareness: Cast Speak With Animals, Beast Sense, Speak With Plants, Locate Creature, Commune With Nature 1/long rest
Spellcasting Focus: Use druidic focus for ranger spells
